items.name: Alchemist
items.description: The ALCHEMIST specializes in powerful buffing Vials and consumable potency.
items.locationInformation: Ironborough / Brocwithe Quarter / Morrow Parish / Lemark District
items.unlock: Approach every sewer drain on the edge of any of the Dran overland areas until you get grabbed by a Manticora. Once you load into the new area, defeat the white Manticora

items.name: Archon
items.description: The ARCHON is the master of Weapon Mods and Mod Power generation.
items.unlock: To Unlock the Red Door you will need the following. Engram Explorer with skill Fortune Hunter (LV10), Engram Invader with skill Worm Hole (LV5), Armor set Realmwalker, Relic Consumable Void Heart, Leto's Amulet, Amber Moonstone, Black Cat Band, Zanias Malice, Anastasijas Inspiration, Cube Gun, Ford's Scattergun, Labyrinth Staff. With all this the door will open.

items.name: Challenger
items.description: The CHALLENGER specializes in close range combat and heightened survivability.
items.unlock: Buy from Reggie at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

items.name: Engineer
items.description: The ENGINEER specializes in Heavy Weaponry which can be carried or placed in turret mode.
items.locationInformation: The Eon Vault / Abyssal Rift / Phantom Wasteland / Timeless Horizon
items.unlock: Found just out of bounds in either of the two overland areas you roll on N'Erud. For an easier time locating this item try using the Explorer Archtype's skill "Fortune Hunter" to highlight the item in the fog.

items.name: Explorer
items.description: The EXPLORER spcializes in finding valuable items and overall team utility.
items.unlock: Finish a full campaign playthrough

items.name: Gunslinger
items.description: The GUNSLINGER specializes in raw damage, firearm handling, and ammo conservation.
items.unlock: Listen to 20 total Mudtooth stories in Ward 13 after finishing your second world in campaign mode

items.name: Handler
items.description: The HANDLER specializes in teamwork in both solo and cooperative scenarios.
items.unlock: Buy from Mudtooth at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

items.name: Hunter
items.description: The HUNTER specializes in ranged damage, precision shots and marking enemies.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

items.name: Invader
items.description: The INVADER specializes elusiveness nad misdirecting the enemy's focus.
items.unlock: Use the "Walker's Dream" item and defeat the "Bane" abberation. To get the "Walker's Dream" item use the Dreamcatcher melee weapon on the sleeping walker special enemy (glowing blue) in an area just off the main path between the Corrupted Harbour and Blackened Citadel checkpoint.

items.name: Medic
items.description: The MEDIC specializes in survivability with enhanced healing and Relic effectiveness.
items.unlock: Buy from Dr. Norah at Ward 13 for 1500 Scrap

items.name: Summoner
items.description: The SUMMONER specializes in using Minions to do their bidding and sacrificing them.
items.unlock: Available at the Bloodmoon Altar for 15 Bloodmoon Essence. Acquire Bloodmoon Essence from killing Root Wisps during a bloodmoon (red moon in sky) in any of Yaesha's outside areas

items.name: Resonance
items.description: Increased Aura Range
items.unlock: Find the secret area at the back left (need to drop down), and activate the fail safe protocol (Co-Op, one player recieving the trait needs to stay outside)

items.name: Vigor
items.description: Increases Max Health

items.name: Endurance
items.description: Increases Max Stamina

items.name: Spirit
items.description: Increases Mod Power Generation

items.name: Expertise
items.description: Reduces Skill Cooldowns

items.name: Ammo Reserves
items.description: Increases Ammo Reserves
items.unlock: Archetype trait of the Gunslinger. Reach Gunslinger level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Flash Caster
items.description: Increases Movement Speed while Aiming
items.unlock: Complete the side path

items.name: Fortify
items.description: Increases Mod and Skill Casting Speed by 5%
items.unlock: Archetype trait of the Archon. Reach Archon level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Kinship
items.description: Reduces friendly fire damage dealt and received
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Handler. Reach Handler level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Longshot
items.description: Increases Weapon Ideal Range
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Hunter. Reach Hunter level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Potency
items.description: Increases Consumable Duration
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Alchemist. Reach Alchemist level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Regrowth
items.description: Increases Health Regen
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Summoner. Reach Summoner level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Strong Back
items.description: Reduces Encumbrance
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Challenger. Reach Challenger level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Swiftness
items.description: Increases all Movement Speed
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Explorer. Reach Explorer level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Triage
items.description: Increases healing provided by Weapon Mods
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Medic. Reach Medic level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Untouchable
items.description: Increases Evade Window
items.unlock: Archetype Trait of the Invader. Reach Invader level 10 to unlock trait use for any build

items.name: Amplitude
items.description: Increases AOE Size
items.unlock: Through the portal that switches locations, go for the one where you can see a world stone. There will be a room with a light cube, shoot it to start the event. After finishing the event it will be rewarded.

items.name: Arcane Strike
items.description: Increases Mod Power Generation for Melee Damage
items.unlock: Defeat a miniboss that spawns in the bone piles

items.name: Barkskin
items.description: Reduces ALL incoming Damage
items.unlock: When talking to Meidre respond positively/selflessly. Ultimately choosing the dialogue option "helping the others

items.name: Blood Bond
items.description: Summon Absorb damage taken by the caster
items.unlock: Defeat the Root Nexus

items.name: Bloodstream
items.description: Increases Grey Health regen
items.unlock: When talking to Meidre respond negtively/selfishly. Ultimately choosing the dialogue option "helping myself

items.name: Fitness
items.description: Increases Evade Distance
items.unlock: Complete the side path

items.name: Footwork
items.description: Increases Armor Effectiveness
items.unlock: Archetype trait of the Engineer. Reach Engineer level 10 to unlock trait for use in any build

items.name: Glutton
items.description: Increases the Use Speed of Consumables and Relics
items.unlock: Eat a friendly player while you have the "Ravenous" status effect

items.name: Handling
items.description: Reduces Weapon Spread and Recoil
items.unlock: Progressing thorugh the area there will be a horde event, clear it to get the reward.

items.name: Recovery
items.description: Increases Stamina Regen
items.unlock: Escort the child back to Oracle's Refuge and talk to the sewing NPC

items.name: Rugged
items.description: Increases the Health of Archetype Summons
items.unlock: Free the Pan that is imprisoned by the Root Nexus

items.name: Scholar
items.description: Increases Experience Gain
items.unlock: Defeat Annihilation.

items.name: Shadeskin
items.description: Increases Resistance to Elemental Status Effect Damage
items.unlock: Save the villager who is being lynched

items.name: Siphoner
items.description: Increases Lifesteal
items.unlock: Eliminate all enemies in the dungeon in less than 6 minutes

items.name: Wayfarer
items.description: Increeses Traversal Movement
items.unlock: Miniboss fight with waves

items.name: Revivalist
items.description: Increases the Speed of Reviving and being Revived
items.unlock: Revive a teammate 15 times

items.name: XMG57 "Bonesaw
items.description: An experimental infantry support weapon used for prolonged suppressive fire. High capacity, long reload, and prone to overheating. Becomes more accurate while holding down the trigger.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Medic archetype

items.name: AS-10 "Bulldog
items.description: A brutal drum-fed fully-automatic 10 gauge shotgun designed for close-quarters combat.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Challenger archetype

items.name: Wrangler 1860
items.description: A well-rounded lever-action rifle effective at most ranges, hampered only by a slow reload.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Gunslinger archetype

items.name: Huntmaster M1
items.description: A powerful single-shot sniper rifle with excellent range and pinpoint accuracy. Comes with a 3x scope. Tap SCOPE to toggle.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Hunter archetype

items.name: Widowmaker
items.description: A powerful single-shot sniper rifle with excellent range and pinpoint accuracy. Comes with a 3x scope. Tap SCOPE to toggle.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Coach Gun
items.description: A double-barrel over/under shotgun modified to fire powerful slugs. High damage with a decent fire rate, but very low magazine capacity.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Blackmaw AR-47
items.description: A fully automatic rifle with a medium capacity. Highly effective with controlled bursts.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13 / Starting weapon for the Handler archetype

items.name: Chicago Typewriter
items.description: A classic Tommy Gun with large ammo capacity and a slow reload. Poor initial accuracy which improves while holding down the trigger.
items.unlock: Get the Biome Portal Key in The Labyrinth and use it on the door hidden in it. To reach it you need to find a portal and jump to the one behind it, enter the next one and enter in the opening in the wall to your left, do some parkour and at the end it will be the door that lead you to Ward 13 Leto's Stash.

items.name: Crossbow
items.description: An accurate and deadly single-shot crossbow with a low sound profile.
items.unlock: Imperial Gardens puzzle, there are some symbols in the area but the pattern seems always the same.

items.name: Ford's Scattergun
items.description: An incredibly powerful 12 gauge shotgun with a wide spread. High damage, slow reload.
items.unlock: From the The Red Throne worldstone on Yaesha, follow the pathway and go into the library on the left. While wearing the Seal of the Empress, the floor underneath you will open, revealing a basement with the weapon inside.

items.name: Pulse Rifle
items.description: An extremely accurate, high-tech pulse rifle which shoots quick three-round bursts.
items.unlock: At the entrance of Ascension Spire, where the Custodian waits, there is a hole at the left of the entrance. Go down and check if you have to insert 1 or 2 keys. If you need 2 you will need to find the Decorum Cipher and Memory Core 2. If not try again.

items.name: Royal Hunting Bow
items.description: The Postulant grants these to those who can defeat him. None know why. Some suspect that the game is mere preamble—that perhaps the true game is what its players do next.
items.unlock: Win a game to the Postulant

items.name: Rusty Lever Action
items.description: A well-worn lever-action rifle.

items.name: Aphelion
items.description: Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.
items.unlock: Crafted by McCabe after giving her the Void Cinder

items.name: Crescent Moon
items.unlock: You need to use the Dreamcatcher while Nimue is sleeping, use the Dreamcatcher on her to get Nimue's Dream. Use it and you get teleported to an open area, walk to the light until you see a blue orb that is the Anamy's Echo

items.name: Deceit
items.description: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire
items.unlock: Defeat Faelin

items.name: Merciless
items.description: Fires tooth-like flechettes. When weapon reticle is fully compressed, flechettes apply 250 BLEEDING Damage over 10s.
items.unlock: Start the encounter by shooting/hitting the Ravager, let the Ravager kill the Doe mid fight and then kill the Ravager to finish the encounter

items.name: Nightfall
items.description: A device forged of pure evil. Fires hardened bone shards at bonus stagger. Semi-automatic with a medium kick.
items.unlock: Defeat the Nightweaver

items.name: Plasma Cutter
items.description: An energy-based cutting tool that increases damage when focused on a target. Can overheat.
items.unlock: Wear the Navigator's Helm, obtained by killing a Zombie wearing the Helm, and run the face recognition to open the door.

items.name: Sagittarius
items.description: A high-powered Bow which deals bonus damage to Weakspots. Can be charged for increased effect. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage
items.unlock: You will need to solve the puzzle for that there will be a book upstairs at your right. You will need to do The Hope, use the symbols and take care the positions that the book describes.

items.name: Twisted Arbalest
items.description: A strange device which fires a bouncing Energy Disc that can hit up to 5 enemies in close proximity. Damage is reduced with each bounce.
items.unlock: Defeat the Corruptor and the golem at least one time.

items.name: Alpha/Omega
items.description: After charging, fires an accurate high-damage rail which penetrates any target. Each successful hit reduces the charge time by 0.1s and increases damage by 10% for 1.5s. Stacks 5x.
items.unlock: Defeat the Final Boss

items.name: Repulsor
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Nightmare Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Savior
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Hardcore Veteran Difficulty Playthrough (Permadeath)

items.name: Sporebloom
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Veteran Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Starkiller
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Apocalypse Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Silverback Model 500
items.description: A powerful hand cannon witha low capacity cylinder. High damage and a heavy kick.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Challenger archetype

items.name: Service Pistol
items.description: Astandard issue military spec sidearm known for its reliability and accuracy.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Medic archetype

items.name: Repeater Pistol
items.description: An accurate semi-automatic pistol that can rapidly fire small-caliber bullets.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Hunter archetype

items.name: Western Classic
items.description: A classic six-shooter. Tough. Dependable.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Gunslinger archetype

items.name: Sureshot
items.description: A high-caliber single-shot hunting pistol that inflicts heavy damage at mid to long range.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Tech 22
items.description: A suppressed small-caliber automatic pistol with medium magazine capacity and a high fire rate.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13/Starting weapon for the Handler archetype

items.name: Double Barrel
items.unlock: Inside the safe. You need to give the woman in the basement 3 little statues to give you the code. 2971

items.name: Rusty Repeater
items.description: An old antique pistol.

items.name: Star Shot
items.description: Fires a fast moving projectile which explodes on contact. Explosion has no damage falloff.
items.unlock: From the coffins in the ground using the big facility you need to power first the Dark Conduit area.

items.name: Cube Gun
items.description: Projectiles return on hit or after reaching max range. Reloading retrieves shot projectiles. Max 5 fired projectiles. Infinite Ammo. Can overheat.
items.unlock: Crafted at McCabe after Defeating The Labyrinth Sentinel

items.name: MP60-R
items.description: A small-caliber submachine gun best suited for close range skirmishes.
items.unlock: Examine the flashlight Ford gave you with the code 0415. Put that code on the chest in Ward 13, take the key and go all way to north past some shipping containers. Open the locked door with the key.

items.name: Sorrow
items.description: The last vestiges of a fallen sister, this mystical crossbow pistol has the ability to recall its bolts to heal the wielder.
items.unlock: Give Meidra the Tear of Kaeula. You can find the Tear of Kaeula ring in Yaesha → Kaeula's Rest

items.name: Enigma
items.description: Fires an electrical stream thatjumps to nearby targets within 7.5m, dealing 25% reduced damage perjump. Applies OVERLOADED for 5.2s.
items.unlock: When the teleporter that changes location appear on a fall jump 2 seconds before it opens i will lead you to an invisible platform.

items.name: Bolt Driver
items.description: An ingenius Gul rifle designed to harness energy from Pan crystals. Charge to fire a 3- shot burst.
items.unlock: After defeating Corrupted Ravager talk to The Flautist and you can hear he is playing a new tune. Play that tune on the water Harp to get the Weapon. 1-4-0-2-5-0-3-0

items.name: Rupture Cannon
items.description: A mid-range Pistol Shotgun with a brisk fire rate and medium recoil Slower reload.
items.unlock: Wait in the second spinning tower to access the secret entrance. There should be the House Lythla Glyph, then open the blocked door with it to get the handgun.

items.name: Hellfire
items.description: Spews flames that apply BURNING which deals 300 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.
items.unlock: From the first checkpoint, before falling into the gap, turn back to the big open area. You will find around truck, You can climb on one of the sides. Below, you will find Hellfire

items.name: Nebula
items.description: Fires a stream of superhot ACID gas which applies the CORRODED effect, dealing 300 CORROSIVE Damage over 15s. Killing targets CORRODED by Nebula spawns a gas cloud which applies its on-hit effect. Gas clouds lasts 2s and can be refreshed.
items.unlock: Defeat Tal Ratha if you choose not to be eaten.

items.name: Meridian
items.description: Fires volatile grenades that explode on direct contact with enemies and deal AOE damage within 4m. Dormant grenades eventually explode and can also be shot to detonate early.
items.location: Great Sewers / Tiller's Rest / Harvester's Reach
items.unlock: Behind a bookshelf there is a hole that leads you to a platform area. There should be a pipe clogged by an enemy, shoot it and let 90 minutes pass (you can do other thing in other areas). After that the water level will be raised and use the planks to get to the weapon.

items.name: Rune Pistol
items.description: An accurate semi-automatic pistol that can rapidly fire small-caliber bullets.
items.unlock: Crafted at Nimue, the material can be found in Losomn

items.name: Steel Sword
items.description: A long, sharp blade hammered out of vehicle leaf springs. Well-rounded for most situations.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Iron Greatsword
items.description: A giant broadsword made from flattened railroad tracks. Dozens of ridges cut in the side for causing irreparable damage.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Steel Flail
items.description: An unorthodox weapon meant to convert momentum into destruction. Some attacks can continuously chain overhead swings.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Scrap Hatchet
items.description: A common chopping tool that has been repurposed for combat. Rapidly cycles attacks from right to left. Charge attacks strike twice.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Scrap Hammer
items.description: A large, heavy warhammer cobbled together from engine components. It is a slow- but-devastating weapon meant to destroy anything it hits.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Steel Spear
items.description: A spear perfect for staying at range with quick, focused attacks. High, single-target damage.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Scrap Staff
items.description: A staff made from old plumbing parts used for controlling wide swaths in front of the wielder.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Steel Katana
items.description: An old piece of steel with serrations cut into one side. Pipe handle provides limited grip.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13. Found next to the Dendroid armour set

items.name: Knuckle Dusters
items.description: Steel knuckles with rusty sawblade tips, designed to boost Unarmed damage.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Rusted Claws
items.description: A pair of old-canine training bracers converted into deadly claws. Used for slashing and ripping.
items.unlock: Buy from Brabus at Ward 13

items.name: Ornate Blade
items.description: An intricately-forged elongated sword. Designed to keep stronger enemies at bay, while remaining light enough for agile maneuvers.
items.unlock: Accuse the right Conspirator. Go to the mirror world and get the dagger, when you got it inspect it and accuse the same symbol as the daggers has in it's pommel.

items.name: Atom Smasher
items.description: A powerful crushing device that harnesses rocket technology to increase smashing force.
items.unlock: Inside the train as you end the quest

items.name: Edge of the Forest
items.description: An elegant, yet light blade, designed to bring beauty to bloodshed. Unstoppable in the hands of a master swordsman.

items.name: Royal Broadsword
items.description: Standard issue Greatsword for the Empress's Royal Guards. Razor-sharp edges, extremely heavy, yet perfectly balanced.
items.unlock: When talking to the queen fight them and let them kill you.

items.name: Dreamcatcher
items.description: There is an ethereal lightness to this weapon, as though it were made of paper or breath.Though it strikes its foes forcibly enough.
items.unlock: Give the Nightweaver idol to the Nightweaver's Web. You get the Idol opening the door in the basement with someone locked inside.

items.name: Labyrinth Staff
items.description: Basic Strikes generate 10% additional Mod Power. Charge Attacks perform an AOE which strikes all enemies within 2m, dealing 75 Damage. AOE Damage generates 50% additional Mod Power.
items.unlock: From the first world stone, staircase down and left. Pass by the shifting portal and continue to an area that has a jump to an invisible bridge, the floating stones will make a path. Wait to the shifting portal to make you a bridge to continue and go forward. There will be the weapon and Bastion Aberration.

items.name: Atom Splitter
items.description: A giant tool for splitting heavy rocks.
items.unlock: Inside the Hatchery there are some roboty arms that lift a platform that let you reach another one, jump just in time to avoid death.

items.name: Spectral Blade
items.description: A super-heated laser sword with an infinitely sharp edge. Perfect for cutting... anything.
items.unlock: Defeat Sha'Hala: Spectral Guardian of N'Erud

items.name: Blade of Gul
items.description: A short, but thick sword, used by Gul Warriors. It's compact design makes for swift yet hard-hitting blows. An excellent close-range option.
items.unlock: Buy from Bloodmoon Altar for 10 Bloodmoon Essence

items.name: Bone Chopper
items.description: A razor-sharp hand axe. Excellent for separating flesh from bone. Charge for double attacks.
items.unlock: Use one of the small lifts after completing The Feast Event to find it in a room.

items.name: Ornate Flail
items.description: An intricately-forged mace with uniquely designed airways. Allows smaller wielders to get the mace up to speed much quicker.
items.unlock: You have to take the secret passage in The Executioner Event. To enter this event you need to shoot a painting that you find when your character says "something's odd

items.name: Rebellion Spear
items.description: A spear perfect for staying at a distance. Has excellent range, great recovery, and focused direct damage for one on one combat.
items.unlock: After saving the Doe during the Corrupted Ravager boss, talk to Bedel of the Vaunnt to get this reward.

items.name: Gas Giant
items.unlock: Defeating Tal Ratha (Metaphysical)

items.name: Vice Grips
items.description: A N'Erudian tool converted into a ruthless ripping device. High raw damage.
items.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator

items.name: Huntress Spear
items.description: The spear is oddly...quiet. Even when you slide your hand across its haft or drop it upon the ground, it makes an unthinkably small amount of noise.
items.unlock: Defeating The Huntress

items.name: Krell Axe
items.description: Infused with Krell Shock magic, can be thrown if the wielder has stamina. Axe will magically reappear in-hand. Charge to throw.
items.unlock: Endaraia's End Labyrinth at the end of the dungeon.

items.name: Assassin's Dagger
items.description: Lightweight. Silent. Deadly. It's rumored that the blade is meant to bestow a slow, agonizing death.
items.unlock: Crafted by Nimue giving her the Assasin Dagger

items.name: Feral Judgement
items.description: A pair of gauntlets with sharp crystal blades that strike with vicious speed and velocity.
items.unlock: The Ravager will ask you to kill the Doe. Shoot the Ravager to start the fight and then kill the Doe before he does.

items.name: Godsplitter
items.description: An expertly balanced blade that is the produc of advanced Fae metallurgy.
items.unlock: Defeat Faerin (Blue Guy)

items.name: Hero's Sword
items.description: An ancient, quick, and versatile blade suited for many situations. Charge attacks cast a projectile for dealing melee damage at range.
items.unlock: Starter Weapon for the Explorer. Buy it from Brabus after Nightmare Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Nightshade
items.description: Fast striking claws with a high Critical Hit Chance.Neutral Dodge grants the power of Lifesteal.
items.unlock: Alt Kill Nightweaver. Have to destroy her heart when she lets it out to obtain this drop.

items.name: Red Doe Staff
items.description: A magical stave rumored to contain a healing spirit within. Strikes with wide swings.
items.unlock: Heal the Doe when The Ravager asks to kill it.

items.name: Stonebreaker
items.description: A massive Greatsword which contains the harnessed magic of a corrupted Guardian. Can summon small shockwaves.
items.unlock: Defeat the Corruptor but don't kill the golem.

items.name: Decayed Claws
items.unlock: Jump off of a tree onto a hidden pathway. It will be atop of a pedastal.

items.name: Smolder
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Veteran Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: World's Edge
items.unlock: Buy it from Brabus after Apocalypse Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Hot Shot
items.description: Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20.3s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 300.8 FIRE Damage over 10s. Mod Power Req: 1,250
items.unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

items.name: Healing Shot
items.description:
Launches a payload that explodes on cotact with allies, healing 35% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dorman payload lasts 30s slowly losing healing potency over time.
Mod Power Req: 600
items.unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

items.name: Concussive Shot
items.description:
Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m dealing 155 damage and 4x impact.
Mod Power Req: 450
items.unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

items.name: Scrap Shot
items.description:
Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and apply SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s.
Mod Power Req: 750
items.unlock: Defeat Root Mantis Boss

items.name: Voltaic Rondure
items.description:
Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20s SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage.
Mod Power Req: 850
items.unlock: Defeat the Bloat King

items.name: Space Crabs
items.description:
Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards the enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each.
Mod Power Req: 450
items.unlock: Defeat Primogenitor Boss

items.name: Prismatic Driver
items.description:
Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE.
Mod Power Req: 50 Per Pulse
items.unlock: Defeat The Custodian's Eye Boss

items.name: Tremor
items.description:
Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact.
Mod Power Req: 900
items.unlock: Defeat the Mother Mind

items.name: Fargazer
items.description:
Calls froth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a traget within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
items.unlock: Deafeat Legion Boss

items.name: Witchfire
items.description:
Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s.
Mod Power Req: 750
items.unlock: Defeat Gwendil: The Unburnt

items.name: Rotted Arrow
items.description:
Fires a rotten arrow that deals 19.8 damage and detonates for another 60 damage within 4m. A deadly gas cloud is left behind that deals 200 damage over 5s.
Mod Power Req: 400
items.unlock: Defeat Shrewd Boss

items.name: Overflow
items.description:
Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 87.5 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250

items.name: Soulbinder
items.description:
Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 650
items.unlock: Compleating the quest reaching the bottom of the Chimney

items.name: Time Lapse
items.description:
Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
items.unlock: Need to find the piece found in Lemark District, by using the same clock hour that the clock in Hewdas Clock. Then fix the clock in Hewdas Clock.

items.name: Firestorm
items.description:
Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the Cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
items.unlock: Defeat the Red Prince

items.name: Helix
items.description:
Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact.
Mod Power Req: 850
items.unlock: Defeat the Astropath

items.name: Astral Burst
items.description:
Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage.
Mod Power Req: 450
items.unlock: From the entrance, the triangle lever should be triggered until the triangle is facing left. The icons lever should be triggered until the doe is in front of you. The circles lever should be triggered until the Ravager, doe and death are encircled with the doe having two circles.

items.name: Blood Draw
items.description:
Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s.
Mod Power Req: 450
items.unlock: Pay the tribute to the Red Prince

items.name: Bore
items.description:
Fires a drill projectile, dealing 80 damage. After burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Last 6s. 
Mod Power Req: 500
items.unlock: Defeat Abomination Boss

items.name: Corrosive Rounds
items.description:
Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 150 damage over 10s.
Mod Power Req: 1,250
items.unlock: Defeat Magister Dullain

items.name: Defrag
items.description:
Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 5s.
Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 5s.
Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s.
Mod Power Req: 1,500
items.unlock: Defeat Cancer

items.name: Energy Wall
items.description:
Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s.
Mod Power Req: 500
items.unlock: Inside one of the towers of the overland. Take the elevator and it will be at the top of the statue that looks like the ones that holds the Seeker Keys

items.name: Familiar
items.description:
Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 25s.
Mod Power Req: 500
items.unlock: Use the Dreamcatcher on the Huntress while she is asleep. Then use the item to defeat her in her dream

items.name: Rootlash
items.description:
Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2)
Mod Power Req: 450
items.unlock: Defeat Kaeula's Shadow

items.name: Skewer
items.description:
Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 150 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 350 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 500
items.unlock: Defeat Venom

items.name: Song of Eafir
items.description:
Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Deals massive impact to all enemies in 10m and deals additional damage to Flying enemies. The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 15% decrease to damage dealt.
Mod Power Req: 1,000
items.unlock: After lowering the bridge to the Ravager's Lair and before defeating him, talk to The Flautist and you can hear he is playing a new tune. Play that tune on the water Harp to get the The Bolt Driver. 1-4-0-2-5-0-3-0 Then talk to him to be rewarded with the crafting material

items.name: Stasis Beam
items.description:
Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s.
Mod Power Req: 50 per Pulse.
items.unlock: While exploring the overland you will find a room with a door. Open it and use the elevator. Go through the cave killing zombies and at the end of the cave you can find the material.

items.name: Cube Shield
items.description: Cube Shield Generates a Cube Shield which absorbs up to 500 damage from incoming enemy projectiles. Lasts 15s.Reactivating fires the Cube Shield which damages enemies as is travels. Damage is increased if the Cube Shield has absorbed enemy projectile damage before firing. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

items.name: Chaos Driver
items.description: Drives electrified rods which tether to other rods within 10m. Tethers deal 20 SHOCK damage per second. Targets embedded with a rod take 20 SHOCK damage per second. They take 20% additionally damage per extra rod in the target. Damage is increased by 1.5% if linked to another rod. Rods in the same target will not link. Mod Power Requirement: 450

items.name: Explosive Shot
items.description: Fires an explosive round that deals up to 155 damage within 9m. Mod Power Requirement: 650

items.name: Screamer
items.description: Fire a high-powered rocket that deals up to 200 damage within 2.5m. Mod Power Requirement: 400

items.name: Nano Swarm
items.description: Unleash a swarm of Nanomachines that seek after enemies within 20 meters and repeatedly attack dealing 6 ACID damage per hit. Lasts 15 seconds Mod Power Requirement: 750

items.name: Soul Brand
items.description: Applies a Soul Brand to all enemies within 25m which lasts 25s. Enemies killed while bearing the Soul Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m, granting 10% of Max Health on contact. Mod Power Requirement: 850

items.name: Eulogy
items.description: Recalls bots which deal 30 damage when pulled from a target and when striking targets on their return. Recalled bolts grant 2% of Max HP. Recalled bolts can also overfill Sorrow by up to +5. Any additional bolts will be returned to reserves. Mod Power Requirement: 600

items.name: Big Bang
items.description: Funnels all current Mod Charges into the next shot. Projectiles deal 65 direct damage and 65 Explosive damage in a 5m per Charge consumed. Explosion applies 75 BURNING damage over 10s per Charge consumed. Additional Charges consumed increase all damage by 5%. Max 5 Charges Mod Power Requirement: 630

items.name: Beta Ray
items.description: Brands a target for 30s. Branded enemies that die leave a Brand at their location.Reloading or Swapping detonates Brands dealing 225 damage.Addiotional Brands (3 Max) on the same target deal 50% damage.Salin enemies return 5-15% of Ammo and Mod power to the weapon. Mod Power Requirement: 450

items.name: Supernova
items.description: Fires the compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or hit wit the primary fire, causes Supernova to explode for 150 FIRE Damage, and 350 BURNING Damage over 10s to all targets within 4m.Striking the Supernova with Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25% and damage by 50%, and spawns a massive shockwave that deals 300 FIRE damage and also applies the initial BURNING amount. Mod Power Requirement: 400

items.name: Moonlight Barrage
items.description: Empowers the Bow for 15s. Arrows apply Moonlight to enemies for 3s. Enemies struck by Crescent Moon while Moonlit release a Moon Essence which returns 1 arrow, heals 5% of Max Health, and grants 15% Fire and Reload Speed for 5s. Basic Shots automatically become Charged Shots. Manually Charged Shots fire two arrows. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

items.name: Ouroboros
items.description: Conjures 3 sword fragments that encircle the wielder for 30s. Performing a Melee Attacks lets loose a Fragment which taints the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Deceit to register as Weaspot hits for a short period of time. Charge Melee attack fires all remaining Fragments at once. Mod Power Requirement: 1,440

items.name: Bloodline
items.description: Fires a devastating blast which penetrates through all enemies in its path. Deals 120 damage with a 25% Critical damage bonus, and 2x additional stagger. Bloodline daage increases by 50% for each enemy penetrated. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Dreadwalker
items.description: Enter the Nightmare Realm. Nightfall gains infinite Ammo, a 35% Fire Rate increase, 10% Lifesteal, and becomes fully automatic. The wielder becomes significatly harder to hit while moving. Disables other weapons and Skills for the duration, or until Dreadwalker is deactivated. Lasts 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

items.name: Heat Sink
items.description: Forces open Plasma Cutter's heat vents dispersing all heat. While active, Plasma Cutter generates 50% less heat, and ramping damage cap is increased to 3x Damage. Overheats automatically when deactivated. Lasts 20s. Mod Power Requirement: 850

items.name: Starfall
items.description: Fires a powerful arrow which deals 30 damage and opens a 7m portal that rains down star fragments. Each fragment deals 50 damage within 4m. Lasts 6s. Mod Power Requirement: 750

items.name: Guardian's Call
items.description: Calls down a Guardian Sword on enemies struck by an Energy Disc. Swords deal 100 damage and 3x stagger within 5m. Mod Power Requirement: 750

items.name: Bloodthirst
items.description: Damage increases by +25% against BLEEDING enemies, and +25% when attacking from behind. Charge Attacks deal 100 BLEEDING damage over 10s Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Fission Strike
items.description: On Neutral Evade Attacks Atom Splitter achieves Nuclear Fission, releasing a wave of charged particles which deals 151.5 Damage to targets within 10m. Charged Neutral Evade Attacks increase range by 3x and Damage by 25% Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Dreamwave
items.description: After dealing 250 damage, Charge Attack will release a Dreamwave, flowing outwards 20m and returning to caster. Dreamwave applies SLOW to all enemies for 10s and grants a Stack of REVERIE for each enemy affected. Each Stack grants +2% to All Damage and +2% Movement Speed, which lasts 15s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Death Sentence
items.description: Dealing Melee Damage 6 times over 10s empowers Feral Judgement. When empowered, Neutral Backdash Charge Attacks apply Death Sentence. After 1.5s of being sentenced, the enemy will suffer 10 Phantom Strikes, dealing X25 Damage each. Deals 25% additional damage to BLEEDING enemies. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Fracture
items.description: Charge Attacks taint the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Godsplitter to register as Weakspot hits for 3s seconds. Duration increases with additional fragments. Max 35s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Energy Wave
items.description: Charge attacks use 35 stamina to release an energy wave projectile allowing the wielder to strike enemies from much farther away. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Athibar
items.description: Charge attacks use 25 stamina to throw the spear, which returns to the wielder's hand. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Krell Edge
items.description: Charge to throw the Krell Axe which applies OVERLOAD on hit, dealing 50 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 10s. Shortly after throwing, another will appear in the wielders hand. Costs 25 Stamina Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Beyond The Veil
items.description: Neutral Evade turns to mist, granting Nightshade 5% base damage as Lifesteal for 5s. Perfect Dodge doubles duration. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Lifeline
items.description: After dealing 250 damage, the next charge attack causes the spirit of the RED DOE to stampede forward, dealing 160 damage to enemies and regenerating 10% Health to allies in its path. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Whirlwind
items.description: Neutral Backdash Charge creates a Whirlwind of slashes which strike all enemies within 8m for 75 damage. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Faultline
items.description: Charge to fire off ground-based shockwaves which deal 115 damage. Costs 35 Stamina Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Root Blades
items.description: Fires a volley of Root Blades in an arc which each deal 25 Damage and apply 200 BLEEDING damage over 10s Mod Power Requirement: 750

items.name: Accelerator
items.description: Charge Melee Attacks increase the speed of all Melee Attacks by 10% for 5s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

items.name: Shatterstar
items.description:
Imbues shots with White hot FIRE. Hits apply BURNING, dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds. Lasts 20s.

Weakspot Hits and Kills cause shots to fragment, automatically targeting nearby enemies. Fragments strike for 50% of the initial damage dealt and apply BURNING.

Mod Power Requirement:1.250

items.name: Spore Shot
items.description:
Fires a rotten spore that explodes dealing 125 damage within 6m and leaves a deadly gas cloud that applies SLOW while dealing 15 damage per second for 7s.

Mod Power Requirement: 350

items.name: Banish
items.description:
Banishes enemies or allies into another dimension for 4s. When Banish ends, enemies take 1.5x the damage from the Repulsor's primary fire for 8s

Powerful enemies won't be banished, but will take increased damage from any Repulsor while debuffed.

Mod Power Requirement: 500

items.name: Gravity Core
items.description:
Fires a highly compressed sphere which draws in objects and deals 50 damage on impact. When colliding with a target, a large Gravity Well opens and draws in objects for 5s.

When the Gravity Well expires, it deals 250 damage within 10m. Adds 200 damage per enemy and divides total damage among all enemies.

Mod Power Requirement:1,500

items.name: Beyond the Veil
items.description: Neutral Evade turns to mist, granting Nightshade 5% base damage as Lifesteal for 5s. Perfect Dodge doubles duration.

items.name: Blaze
items.description: Charge Melee Attacks apply BURNING which deals 150 FIRE damage over 5s

items.name: Horizon Strike
items.description: Charge Attacks release a wide horizontal projectile that penetrates through multiple enemies dealing 116 damage.

items.name: Dying Breath
items.description: Builds up charge with damage dealt. When full, basic attacks apply CORRODED, for 5s. Neutral Evade attacks explode in a 3m AOE and leave a TOXIC cloud.

items.name: Transpose
items.description:
Picking up Ammo increases Ranged damage by 10% for 20s. 
Level 10: Ammo pickups are added directly to the magazine.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration W.D. 109

items.name: Feedback
items.description:
Using this weapon's Mod generates 10% of single charge value as passive Mod Power over 10s. Does not stack.
Level 10: Mod Damage generates 10% of damage dealt as Mod Power.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Harmonizer
items.description:
Increases Mod Damage by 10%. 
Level 10: Generate 25% additional Mod Power for Stowed Weapon.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Resentment
items.description:
Gain 10% Melee Damage when Grey Health is present. 
Level 10: Reduces Stagger by 1 when using any Melee Attack.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Shield Breaker
items.description:
Melee Attacks grant a Shield for 2% of Max Health. Max 20%. Last 10s. 
Level 10: Charged Melee Attacks consume all Shield to increase damage of next strike by 1% per Shield Consumed. Max 100%.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Slayer
items.description:
Reloading increases the damage of this weapon's next shot by 10%. Lasts 3s. 
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed by 15%.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Weaponlord
items.description:
Basic Melee Attack increase the next Charge Attack by 7%. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Charge Attack gains 100% Critical Chance.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Dervish
items.description:
Increases Melee Damage by 20% for 10s when activating a Skill. 
Level 10: Melee kills reduce Skill Cooldowns by 5%. Can trigger once every 5s.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Deadly Calm
items.description:
Continuosly Aiming increases Ranged Damage by up to 10% over 3s. 
Level 10: Ranged Critical Hit Chance increased by 10%.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Battery
items.description:
Ranged Hits increase the next Weakspot Hit by 10% per stack. Max 5 Stacks. 
Level 10: At Max Stacks, the next Weakspot Hit deals 15% additional damage over 3s.
items.unlock: Buy from Dwell

items.name: Timewave
items.description:
Mod Use applies SLOW status on all enemies within 7.5m for 3.5s.
Level 10: Increase this weapon's Ranged damage by 15% to enemies inflicted with SLOW status.
items.unlock: Defeat Restless Spirit Boss

items.name: Refunder
items.description:
Shots from this weapon have 20% chance to return spent Ammo to reserves.
Level 10: Refunded Ammo has a 50% chance to also be added to stowed weapon reserves.
items.unlock: Defeat E.D. Alpha

items.name: Momentum
items.description:
When this weapon scores a Critical hit, it increases Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 1.5% for 3s. Max 10 stacks.
Level 10: Critical Hits from this weapon add 2 stacks. Increases duration by 2s.
items.unlock: Defeat Mantagora

items.name: Lithely
items.description:
Increase this weapon's Reload Speed by 4% for each enemy killed between reloads. Lasts 15s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Reloading at Max Stacks increases Ranged Damage by 20% for 15s.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Barghest the Vile.

items.name: Striker
items.description:
Melee Hits increase Melee Damage by 3% for 10s. Max 5 Stacks.
Level 10: Increases Movement Speed by 3% per stack.
items.unlock: Defeat Ripsaw Boss

items.name: Extender
items.description:
Increases Magazine Capacity of this weapon by 30%.
Level 10: Increases Reload Speed of this weapon by 15%
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Root Hulk

items.name: Bandit
items.description:
On hit, grants 10% chanche to return spent Ammo directly into the magazine of this weapon.
Level 10: When Ammo is returned to this weapon, it gains 10% increased Fire Rate for 3s. Duration can increase up to 10s
items.unlock: Defeat The Weald Stalker and The Gnarled Archer

items.name: Reinvigorate
items.description:
Reduces Stamina Cost of all Charged Melee Attacks by 25%.
Level 10: Melee Charge Attacks gain 15% additional damage and 10% Critical Chance.
items.unlock: Defeat Defiler Boss that spawns after killing Nexus Root with the imprissioned Pan

items.name: Bulletweaver
items.description:
Mod use increases Fire Rate of this weapon by 10% for 7s.
Level 10: Reloading from empty increases Mod Generation of this weapon by 15%. Lasts 7s.
items.unlock: Defeat Atrophy hidden boss. Found in the hidden library behind a pressure plated wall.

items.name: Failsafe
items.description:
Attached Mod deals 10% additional Mod Damage.
Level 10: Attached Mod use gains a 15% chace to not consume charge.
items.unlock: Don't kill any bugs in the area, instead run to the secret room and press the switch. That would kill all the bugs and make an Aberration appear.

items.name: Ghost Shell
items.description:
After 3 consecutive Weakspot Hits, increase the damage of the next Weakspot Hit by 20%.
Level 10: Increases Weakspot Critical Chance by 15%.
items.unlock: Up right in the area there will be a statue with the Doe and Ravager guarded by 2 Pan Warriors. Clear it and equip the Red Doe Sigil. At the front of the statue it will move revealing a hidden staircase leading to the Rotten Thaen Fruit, use it to get the Mutator.

items.name: Supercharger
items.description:
Increases Charge Speed of Bows and Fusion Rifles by 10%.
Level 10: Charged Primary Shots of Bows and Fusion Rigles gain 15% Critical Chance.
items.unlock: Use the "Walker's Dream" item and defeat the "Bane" abberation. To get the "Walker's Dream" item use the Dreamcatcher melee weapon on the sleeping walker special enemy (glowing blue) in an area just off the main path between the Corrupted Harbour and Blackened Citadel checkpoint.

items.name: Twisting Wounds
items.description:
Increases Ranged damage of this weapon by 10% to BLEEDING targets.
Level 10: This weapon's Ranged Weakspot and Ranged Critical Hits apply BLEEDING, dealing 100 BLEED damage over 10s.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Grime Crawler

items.name: Disengage
items.description:
Melee Strikes increase the damage of the next Backdash Evade Attack by 4%. Max 5 Stacks.
Lasts 7.5s.
Level 10: Perfect Neutral Evades grants 5 stacks
items.unlock: Defeat The Progeny

items.name: Misfortune
items.description:
Increase Melee damage by 5% for each unique Negative Status the target is suffering from.
Level 10: Melee Attacks apply SLOW for 2s.
items.unlock: In the Jester's Card event, choose the devil card. Defeat the Aberration that Spawns

items.name: Overdrive
items.description:
Melee Critical Hits increase Melee Critical Chance and Critical Damage by 5% for 7.5s. stacking up to 5 times.
Level 10: Melee Critical Strikes deal 20% additional damage.
items.unlock: Solve the Consort's Puzzle and loot the coffins after opening the door, then defeat the Aberration Wither

items.name: Steadfast
items.description:
Charged Melee Attacks cannot be interrupted and gain 10% damage reduction from all sources.
Level 10: All damage taken during Charged Melee Attack is covered to Grey Health.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Executioner

items.name: Transference
items.description:
Melee Hits generate 5% Ammo Reserves for both Firearms. Cooldown 10s.
Level 10: When a Firearm reserve is full, melee Strikes generate 100% additional Mod Power ofr that weapon.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Fetid Corpse. To access it you need to enter the pods that are at the last area.

items.name: Vampire Blade
items.description:
Increases Melee Damage by 10% while within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.
Level 10: Melee Hits vs BLEEDING targets will Lifesteal 3% of base damage dealt.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Fester

items.name: Vengeful Strike
items.description:
Increases Melee damage by 20% when below 50% Max Health.
Level 10: Increases Melee Critical Chance by 15% when below 50% Max Health.
items.unlock: Defeat the Aberration Bastion, just where you found the Labyrinth Staff

items.name: Dragon Heart
items.description: On use, Heals 70 Health over 0.5s.

items.name: Blooming Heart
items.description: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs.
items.unlock: There is a Vault inside an illusory wall, to solve it use the elevator outside but don't jump in. Once the elevator is up you can see the symbols you need.

items.name: Crystal Heart
items.description: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s. Movement Speed is reduced by 50% and damage incoming is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.
items.unlock: Reach the final area and turn the facility on.

items.name: Decayed Heart
items.description: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

items.name: Enlarged Heart
items.description: Innate Double Use Speed. One use, heals 140 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved.
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 6 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

items.name: Lifeless Heart
items.description: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled.
items.unlock: Eat the Fruit of Death 3 times, each time takes a bite until it breaks and gives you the Lifeless Heart.

items.name: Pulsing Heart
items.description: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 23 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.
items.unlock: At the end of the dungeon there is a preassure plate that opens a wall, at the end of the maze there are some stairs that leads you to a jump. In that room at your left should be an illusory wall.

items.name: Quilted Heart
items.description: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

items.name: Reprocessed Heart
items.description: On use, converts 5 Health as Grey Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for both weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

items.name: Resonating Heart
items.description: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhealed Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s.

items.name: Ripened Heart
items.description: On.use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

items.name: Runed Heart
items.description: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s for both weapons.

items.name: Salvaged Heart
items.description: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.
items.unlock: Crafted at Drzyr Replicator. 10 Lumenite Crystal, 15 Relic Dust, 1500 Scrap

items.name: Shielded Heart
items.description: On use, grants a SHIELD for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until SHIELD is removed by damage.
items.unlock:
Find your way to the back of a statue that is located at the hall where E.D. Alpha is encountered to insert a Stellar-Powered Cell at the back of the statue, it's not reachable from the ground. You must make your way around to a higher level around the backside area of the statue, find an elevator, trigger it to go up but don't jump on it, it will reveal a hole underneath, jump down to access the slot and insert a Stellar-Powered Cell.
This will open a door on the side of the main hall, go through it.

items.name: Siphon Heart
items.description: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.
items.unlock: Give the Essence Echo to the Custiodian. For that you will need to defeat Tal Ratha.

items.name: Tormented Heart
items.description: Innate 20% Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 240 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.
items.unlock: Feed the Override Pin from N'Erud to the Nightweaver's Web.

items.name: Tranquil Heart
items.description: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.
items.unlock: Crafted by giving Nimue a Tormented Heart

items.name: Unsullied Heart
items.description: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.
items.unlock: While wearing the One True King Sigil, stand in front of the statue that wields a greatsword while you are in the Beatific Palace. Use the lever to change zone if needed.

items.name: Void Heart
items.description: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.
items.unlock: Custodian storyline on N'Erud, do not use the override pin, talk to him and wait ~12 real life hours for him to send the ship to Alepsis-Taura. If you don't see it go to Ward 13. You can change your system date to be one day forward and get it.

items.name: Constrained Heart
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 12 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

items.name: Diverted Heart
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass after Defeating 18 World Bosses. Only counts if the boss is killed with the 2 different kills if they have it

items.name: Gunfire Security Lanyard
items.description: Automatically reloads Magazine over time. Does not work for single shot weapons.
items.unlock: Become Ford

items.name: Emergency Switch
items.description: When below 50% Health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.
items.unlock: Found on a corpse

items.name: Samoflange

items.description: Increases Grey Health Regeneration rate by 2 per second.

items.name: Dying Ember
items.description: Gain 5% of base Melee damage dealt as Lifesteal.

items.name: Endaira's Endless Loop
items.description: After Sprinting for 2s, the wearer gains 1.5 Health Regeneration per second until they stop Sprinting.

items.name: Excess Coil
items.description: Activating a Skill grants a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Cannot stack with itself. Lasts 10s.
items.location: Void Vessel Facility / The Hatchery / The Putrid Domain / The Dark Conduit
items.unlock: Robot Hanger event. When facing W.D. 109 Aberration you need to lure him all the way back to one of the rooms that is locked and has the ring in it.

items.name: Fae Hunter Ring
items.description: Increases Range of Firearms by 30%.

items.name: Fae Protector Signet
items.description: Increases Max Health and Stamina by 10 and Reduces Encumbrance by 5.
items.unlock: Defeat all members of the Council

items.name: Fae Warrior Ring
items.description: Increases Melee Damage by 15%.

items.name: Faelin's Sigil
items.description: Critical and Weak Spot Hits generate 10% additional Mod Power.
items.unlock: Given by Faelin if you kill Faerin and report to him

items.name: Feastmaster's Signet
items.description: Increases active Concoction Limit by 1.
items.unlock: In the Feast event room there will be a chimney with fire. Crouch through it and at the other side you will find the ring.

items.name: Frivolous Band
items.description: Increases Evade Speed by 10%. Perfect Evades increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Speed by 10% for 10s.

items.name: Game Master's Pride
items.description: Reduces all healing by 50%. Splits all damage and remaining healing evenly amoung all allies wearing this ring.
items.unlock: In the bottom left room. You will need to put your white piece in the same corner and another player there to get it. After that leave the bottom left space without any piece.

items.name: Haymaker's Ring
items.description: Increase Melee damage by 0.2% for every 1 points of Armor Encumbrance.

items.name: Hex Ward
items.description: Prevents CURSE Blight.
items.unlock: Crafted by Nimue for 5 Lumenite Crystal

items.name: Lodestone Ring
items.description: Increases all damage dealt against illuminated enemies by 5%.
items.unlock: Rewarded by Bedel of the Vaunnt if the players talks to him while wearing the Lodestone Crown after defeating the Ravager.

items.name: Mechanic's Cog
items.description: While carrying an Engineer Heavy Weapon, gain 15% Movement Speed and 1s BULWARK
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

items.name: Metal Driver
items.description: Killing Blows increase Reload Speed by 5% for 7s. Stacks 3x.
items.unlock: Wait in the second spinning tower to access the secret entrance. Behind the House Lythla Glyph, to the left, there is a breakable object you can shoot and jump over the ledge to find a secret entrance.

items.name: Meteorite Shard Ring
items.description: Increases Encumbrance by 50. Increases Unarmed damage by 50%.
items.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Iron, 750 Scrap

items.name: Microcompressor
items.description: Reduces Heat Generation when firing weapons that Overheat by -30%. Increases Heat Reduction Rate by 30%.
items.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 10 Forged Iron, 750 Scrap

items.name: Point Focus Ring
items.description: Reduces Initial Spread and Recoil by 35%.

items.name: Power Saver
items.description: At Max Health, gain a 25% chance to not use a Relic charge.

items.name: Propulsion Loop
items.description: After killing an enemy, increases Movement Speed by 5% and Consumable Use Speed by 10% for 10s. Stacks 3x.
items.location: Astropath's Respite / Terminus Station / Tower of the Unseen / Spectrum Nexus
items.unlock: While riding an elevator check the walls to find a hole, follow the path to find the ring.

items.name: Rerouting Cable
items.description: Gain 5% of Max Health as a SHIELD for 5s after spending 25 Stamina. Accumulation resets after 5s of inaction. Max 50% SHIELD.
items.location: Vault of the Formless / Void Vessel Facility

items.name: Restriction Cord
items.description: Restricts the wearer from Healing above 50% of their Max Health and reduces all incoming damage by 10%.
items.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

items.name: Ring of Crisis
items.description: When wearer's Health drops below 25%, gain a Shield for 25% of Max Health. Lasts 10s.
items.unlock: Inside the dungeon you will find the Aerary Glyph that unlocks the locked door. After defeating the Aberration The Progeny you can find the ring.

items.name: Ring of Deflection
items.description: Direct Damage against wearer has a 20% Chance to be converted entirely to Grey Health.
items.unlock: In the dungeon there will be an area that activates a purple Orb that will follow you to take you down. In the area you will find the ring.

items.name: Ring of Omens
items.description: Evades cost 15% Max Health as Grey Health instead of Stamina.
items.unlock: During a Blood Moon, you will need to solve the puzzle to enter the room at the right from when you enter to obtain it. If it's not during a Blood Moon the trapdor won't open.

items.name: Ring of Retribution
items.description: Incoming enemy damage increases Reload Speed and all outgoing damage by 10%. Lasts 15s.
items.location: Random world drop / The Tormented Asylum
items.unlock: At the Nightweaver's Web you will need to give it the Dria's Anklet quest item.

items.name: Rock of Anguish
items.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed and 7.5% Reload Speed for every 25% of Max Health missing.
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

items.name: Rotward
items.description: Prevents ROOT ROT Blight.
items.unlock: Buy from Bedel of the Vaunnt

items.name: Rusted Heirloom
items.description: Grants 2 Stacks of BULWARK below 50% Max HP.
items.unlock: Inside a Safe (3581). The code could be found using your flashlight to lit the numbers in the area.

items.name: Sapphire Dreamstone
items.description: Critical Hits reduce Skill Cooldowns by 3%. Can only happen once every 2s.
items.unlock: You have to take the secret passage in The Executioner Event. To enter this event you need to shoot a painting that you find when your character says "something's odd

items.name: Seal of the Empress
items.description: Increases Max Health by 20. Reduces Max Stamina by 10.
items.unlock: Finish the quest without giving any specific item. For that you will need to defeat the world boss and come back to talk to her.

items.name: Singed Ring
items.description: Increases all damage dealt to BURNING enemies by 10%.
items.unlock: At the Burning Event, watch or fail the event. Rest at a checkpoint, comeback to see a pig is eating the corpse. Kill the pig to obtain the ring.

items.name: Stone of Malevolence
items.description: Elemental Status damage generates 15% additional Mod Power.

items.name: Tarnished Ring
items.description: Increases damage of Unarmed Attacks by 30%.
items.unlock: Behind Whisper's there is a ladder, climb it and talk to the man that is up there. If he's sleeping change worlds and try again.

items.name: Tear of Kauela
items.description: Increases Relic capacity by 2 while equipped

items.name: Tempest Conduit
items.description: After receiving Elemental Damage, increases all damage dealt by 10% and Resistance to the received Element by 20 for 20s.
items.unlock: At the end of the dungeon there is a preassure plate that opens a wall, at the end of the preasure plate maze is the ring.

items.name: Tightly Wound Coil
items.description: When spending 75% or more of current magazine, gain a SHIELD of 10% of Max Health for 5s. Does not stack with itself.
items.unlock: Inside a capsule.

items.name: Tomb Dweller's Ring
items.description: Increases Movement Speed by 10% for 7s after Vaulting, Climbing, Leaping, and entering Water, stacks 1x. Reduces Fall Damage by 25%.

items.name: Wax Sealed Ring
items.description: Killing blows increase Ranged and Melee Damage by 4% for 15s. Stacks 3x.
items.location: The Far Woods / The Forbidden Grove

items.name: Wind Hollow Circlet
items.description: Increases Reload Speed by 12%.
items.unlock: There is a circular building that sounds like a didgeridoo, each floor does one note. Behind a waterfall there is a book with the songs you need to play. Play the song of the Queen to get the Wind Hollow Circlet.

items.name: Zania's Malice
items.description: Dealing Weakspot damage increases Weakspot damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 3x.

items.name: Anahae Crystal
items.description: Deal 5% additional damage for each Status Effect the target is suffering from.
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Yaesha World.

items.name: Band of Accord
items.description: Ammo acquired on pickup is increased by 25% per ally also wearing this ring and is shared with other allies.
items.unlock: Buy from Reggie after killing 25 Aberrations

items.name: Black Cat Ring
items.description: When taking fatal damage, instead of dying, the wearer's Health will drop to 1, and Movement Speed will increase by 25% for 10s. 2m cooldown.
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after dying 15 times

items.name: Blackout Ring
items.description: After dealing 20% of the Weapon's Total Magazine base damage, increases Reload Speed by 3%. Stacks 5x Cleared on Reload.
items.unlock: There is a room with crates that if you break there is hole that leads you to a room. Just before the exit of the room there is a hole that let you shoot into a the cable that gives energy to the door locked, shoot it.

items.name: Bright Steel Ring
items.description: Gives the wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of ther Armor Encumbrance.
items.unlock: Buy from Reggie after finishing 15 Worlds, inlcuding adventure ones.

items.name: Devourer Loop
items.description: Critical Hits have a 1% chance to reset Skill Cooldowns. Can only occur once every 10s. Increases all incoming damage by 10%
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Apocalypse Difficulty Playthrough

items.name: Dran Scavenger Ring
items.description: Collection Scrap, Iron and Ammo pickups regenerates 10% of Max Health and increases all damage dealt by 8% for 30s.
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Losomn World.

items.name: Drzyr Sniper Sigil
items.description: Increases the minimum damage at Max Falloff Range from 20% to 40%.
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat N'Erud World.

items.name: Embrace of Sha'Hala
items.description: Wearer gains 5% incoming damage reduction for each Negative Status Effect or Blight they are suffering from. Max 4 stacks.
items.unlock: Talk to The Custodian after defeating Sha'Hala

items.name: Focusing Shard
items.description: Reduce Recoil by 25%. Aiming Down Sights gradually reduces Spread by 35% over 3.5s
items.unlock: In the dungeon there will be an area that activates a purple Orb that will follow you to take you down. In the area you will find the ring.

items.name: Provisioner Ring
items.description: Firearms reload over time while stowed.
items.unlock: Buy it from Reggie after Hardcore mode beat Labyrinth World.

items.name: Ring of Flawed Beauty
items.description: Ranged Weakspot damage is increased by 25%. Ranged damage is reduced by 15% when failing to hit a Weakspot.
items.unlock: Buy it from Cass (RNG)

items.name: Supression Ward
items.description: Prevents SUPPRESSION Blight.
items.unlock: Crafted by Drzyr Replicator for 5 Iron, 250 Scrap

items.name: Faerin's Sigil
items.description: Critical and Weakspot Hits generates 10% additional Mod Power.
items.unlock: Given by Fearin, after killing Fealin

items.name: Zohee's Ring
items.description: Increases Mod Duration by 15%.
items.unlock: Given by the Attendant after being arrested and killing the corruptor
